summary: Changed development server ports to avoid conflicts: Laravel backend from 8000 to 8080, Vite dev server from 5173 to 3001. Updated vite.config.js, package.json scripts, .cursorrules, and README.md with new port configuration. Both servers confirmed running on new ports.
current_status: Development servers running on ports 8080 (Laravel) and 3001 (Vite). Configuration files updated. Use 'npm run start' to start both servers.
